author: cnbc.com
title: Atomera to Announce and Host First Quarter 2018 Business Update & Financial Results Conference Call on Thursday, May 3, 2018
text:
LOS GATOS, Calif., April 12, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Atomera Incorporated (NASDAQ:ATOM), a semiconductor materials and intellectual property licensing company focused on deploying its proprietary technology into the semiconductor industry, today announced today that it will host a conference call and webcast to present its first quarter 2018 business update and financial results on Thursday, May 3, 2018 at 2:00 pm Pacific time.
The call can be accessed in the following ways:
( 844) 263-8318 from within the United States +1 (213) 358-0960 internationally via webcast from the company’s web site at www.atomera.com in the investor relations section replay available for 7 days (855) 859-2056 or (404) 537-3406 passcode 2688678
About Atomera
Atomera Incorporated has developed Mears Silicon Technology™ (MST ® ), which increases performance and power efficiency in semiconductor transistors. MST can be implemented using equipment already deployed in semiconductor manufacturing facilities and is complementary to other nano-scaling technologies already in the semiconductor industry roadmap. More information can be found at www.atomera.com
